attributes.action: Change the current GCSEs back to the old one but with the grade 9 (A**) in it
attributes.background: Over the past 3 years we have entered a transition in the landscape of secondary education across the nation. The new grades (1-9) have replaced the old standard ones (A-G) and students as a cohort have evidently taken aback by the sudden change in “the biggest exam of their lives” Change is needed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly how you'd like GCSEs to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
